name: aai-signals
title: AAI-信号
author: Earendel
description: 增加生命值、速度、角度、陆地、水域、坐标及敌人侦查等信号。主要为AAI-可编程载具MOD而设计，不过也能单独使用。
description_original: Additional signals for things like health, speed, angle, land, water, position (X & Y), enemy detection, etc... Developed primarily for the Programmable Vehicles Mod but the signals can be used for anything.
